mapper.insert: INSERT INTO api_spring_default_token(connect_ip, connect_agent, refresh_token, id) VALUES(#{connect_ip}, #{connect_agent}, #{refresh_token}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT token_id FROM api_spring_default_token WHERE connect_agent = #{connect_agent} AND connect_ip = #{connect_ip} AND id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO api_spring_default_user(id, password, name, zonecode, address, birthday, phone, email) VALUES(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{zonecode}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{email})
